meanings.definition: The character and atmosphere of a place.
meanings.sent1: The cozy ambiance of the cafe made me feel relaxed.
meanings.sent2: The ambiance of the forest was peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent3: The ambiance of the haunted house was surprisingly welcoming.
meanings.sent4: The ambiance of the city at night was like a blanket of twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The ambiance of the beach at sunset was truly magical.

meanings.definition: The mood or feeling of a particular environment.
meanings.sent1: The festive ambiance of the party put everyone in a joyful mood.
meanings.sent2: The ambiance of the library was quiet and studious.
meanings.sent3: The ambiance of the classroom was so boring that even the walls seemed to yawn.
meanings.sent4: The ambiance of the carnival was filled with excitement and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The ambiance of the rainy day matched my melancholy mood perfectly.

meanings.definition: The overall impression or effect of a setting or situation.
meanings.sent1: The elegant ambiance of the hotel left a lasting impression on the guests.
meanings.sent2: The ambiance of the movie theater created a sense of anticipation.
meanings.sent3: The ambiance of the office meeting was so tense that you could cut it with a knife.
meanings.sent4: The ambiance of the art gallery was like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The ambiance of the old mansion carried a sense of mystery and intrigue.
